review: This is an awesome way to access my prime, used to be on my tablet or my son's playstation.  I am so happy I bought this, I am not a huge fan of watching stuff on my tablet and dealing with the playstation was a pain (for me anyway)!  I can take this from room to room easily, and we took it when we went to visit family a month or so ago.
author: SUSAN SPARKS

review: The stick itself works well, but I've struggled to have it get a connection when it's more than 5 ft away from my wireless router.  I had it hooked up in the living room (right next to our wireless router) and it worked well.  However, when I moved it to the bedroom (20-25ft away), it has a hard time staying connected, and then my streaming shows stall, or stutter.  It's not my router, as I switched it with a Roku and the Roku works with no trouble.  Pretty disappointing considering the functionality of the stick is much better than the Roku.
